titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LACTATE DEHYDROGENASE LEVEL (NORMAL UPPER LIMIT) - Description

div.p: LACTATE DEHYDROGENASE LEVEL (NORMAL UPPER LIMIT) is the upper limit of normal for the Lactate Dehydrogenase (LDH) (an enzyme found in abnormal amounts in the blood of PATIENTS with cancer), where the UCUM UNIT OF MEASUREMENT is 'Units per litre (U/L)'.
